description: Unique internal identifier for a repair-component record used across maintenance and repair workflows and reporting.
Alphanumeric code that classifies the component or service assembly used when recording repairs and preventive maintenance.
Human-readable description of the component or service category corresponding to the code, shown on work orders, catalogs, and reports.
Boolean flag indicating the component/category is retired and should not be selected for new work; retained only for historical records.
Boolean flag indicating this component/category is the default choice in applicable contexts (e.g., templates or selection lists); exact scope may varyâ€”confirm with SME.
